title: TU Dresden - Wikipedia
snippet: The main campus is located south of the city center, mostly in the area bordered by Nöthnitzer Straße, Fritz-Förster-Platz and Münchner Platz; the medical faculty can be found in the Johannstadt district. The faculty of forestry, formerly the Royal Saxon Academy of Forestry, resides in ...

title: Locations — TU Dresden — TU Dresden
snippet: TU Dresden has two central locations in the city of Dresden - the TUD|Campus Südvorstadt and the TUD|Campus Johannstadt. There are also other locations such as the Botanical Garden and university …

title: Campus — TU Dresden — TU Dresden
snippet: The main campus of TUD Dresden University of Technology is located south Dresden's city centre and can be easily reached by bus (bus lines 61, 66, 85) and by tram (tram lines 3 and 8) or via the A17 highway (exit: “Dresden Südvorstadt”).

title: Dresden University of Technology - Simple English Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
snippet: The Dresden University of Technology (German: Technische Universität Dresden · ; TUD) is a university in Dresden, in Germany. It is the largest university in the state of Saxony and one of the ten largest universities in Germany with around ...
